Title: Anandabhadram
Writer: Sunil Parameshwaran (story,  screenplay and dialogue), Sunil Parameswaran
Actors: Prithviraj Sukumaran, Kavya Madhavan, Manoj K. Jayan, Kalabhavan Mani
Plot: When a young man travels to his ancestral home in a small Indian village, he faces the wrath of an evil sorcerer.
